JSON_SETTINGS.query:
| paramdefaults 
	category_and_entity =  "none#-#-#none"
	chart_type='bar'
	chart_point_radius=2
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
| globals
	multidisplay=param("columns", 5)
	notStatsFields = [ FK_ID_ENTITY, FK_ID_VALUES, FK_ID_DATE, TIME, COUNT
				  	 , MIN, AVG, MAX, SUM, VAL, "P50", "P95", GRANULARITY]
	notChartFields = [ FK_ID_ENTITY, FK_ID_VALUES, FK_ID_DATE, TIME, COUNT, MIN, AVG
				  	 , MAX, SUM, VAL, "P50", "P95", GRANULARITY, CATEGORY, TIMECRATE]
| meta name="data" 
| source eavstats 
	category = extract( param(category_and_entity, "none#-#-#none"), "(.*)#-#-#.*")
	entity = extract( param(category_and_entity, "none#-#-#none"), ".*#-#-#(.*)")
	detailed=true
| crates
	name=TIMECRATE
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields
;
#############################
# Count
#############################
| meta name = "Count" title=true titleduration=false
| resultcopy "data"
| stats by=fields(globals("notStatsFields")) COUNT=SUM(COUNT)
 | chart 
	by=fields(globals("notChartFields"))
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=COUNT
	type=param("chart_type")
	pointradius=param("chart_point_radius", 2)
	multichart=true
	multicharttitle=true
	multichartcolumns=1
	showlegend=false
;
#############################
# Min
#############################
| meta name = "Min" title=true titleduration=false
| resultcopy "data"
| stats by=fields(globals("notStatsFields")) MIN=MIN(MIN)
 | chart 
	by=fields(globals("notChartFields"))
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=MIN
	type=param("chart_type")
	pointradius=param("chart_point_radius", 2)
	multichart=true
	multicharttitle=true
	multichartcolumns=1
	showlegend=false
;
#############################
# Average
#############################
| meta name = "Average" title=true titleduration=false
| resultcopy "data"
| stats by=fields(globals("notStatsFields")) AVG=AVG(AVG)
 | chart 
	by=fields(globals("notChartFields"))
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=AVG
	type=param("chart_type")
	pointradius=param("chart_point_radius", 2)
	multichart=true
	multicharttitle=true
	multichartcolumns=1
	showlegend=false
;
#############################
# Max
#############################
| meta name = "Max" title=true titleduration=false
| resultcopy "data"
| stats by=fields(globals("notStatsFields")) MAX=MAX(MAX)
 | chart 
	by=fields(globals("notChartFields"))
	x=TIMECRATE
	y=MAX
	type=param("chart_type")
	pointradius=param("chart_point_radius", 2)
	multichart=true
	multicharttitle=true
	multichartcolumns=1
	showlegend=false
;
#############################
# Percentile 95
#############################
| meta name = "95th Percentile" title=true titleduration=false
| resultcopy "data"
| stats by=fields(globals("notStatsFields")) "P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
 | chart 
	by=fields(globals("notChartFields"))
	x=TIMECRATE
	y="P95"
	type=param("chart_type")
	pointradius=param("chart_point_radius", 2)
	multichart=true
	multicharttitle=true
	multichartcolumns=1
	showlegend=false

#############################
# Remove Data Result
#############################
| resultremove "data"

| paramdefaults 
	category_and_entity = "none#-#-#none"
	chart_type='bar'
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
| source eavstats 
	category = extract( param(category_and_entity), "(.*)#-#-#.*")
	entity = extract( param(category_and_entity), ".*#-#-#(.*)")
	detailed=true
| crates
	name=TIMESTAMP
	by=TIME 
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| sort TIME # sort here to make sure fields()-function gets all existing fields
| stats
	by=fields(FK_ID_ENTITY
			, FK_ID_VALUES
			, FK_ID_DATE
			, TIME
			, COUNT
			, MIN
			, AVG
			, MAX
			, SUM
			, VAL
			, "P50"
			, "P95"
			, GRANULARITY
		)
	COUNT=SUM(COUNT)
	MIN=MIN(MIN)
	AVG=AVG(AVG)
	MAX=MAX(MAX)
	SUM=SUM(SUM)
	"P50"=PERC("P50", 50)
	"P95"=PERC("P95", 95)
| sort CATEGORY, ENTITY, TIMESTAMP

parameters.LABEL: Query Select
parameters.NAME: category_and_entity
parameters.VALUE:
| source appdb
	query=`
	SELECT CATEGORY, NAME FROM CFW_EAV_ENTITY
	`
| sort CATEGORY, NAME
| set 
	value = CATEGORY + "#-#-#" + NAME
	label = CATEGORY + ": " + NAME
| keep value, label
